DOC.brief_title: Objective Physical Activity Assesment Postmenopausal Women
DOC.detailed_description: This observational study aim accurately assess weekly physical activity level postmenopausal woman use lactate threshold individualize accelerometer cut-points . Postmenopausal woman recruit local advertisement public health center . Each woman perfom different day progressive discontinuous submaximal walking-running test several constant speed test wear accelerometer identify individual lactate threshold ( LT ) , maximal lactate steady state ( MLSS ) correspond accelerometer activity counts/min ( cpm ) . Participants wear actigraph accelerometer ( wGT3X-BT ) seven day . Linear regression equation develop participant determine accelerometer activity count intensity level : 1 ) sedentary behaviour ( < 200 cpm ) , 2 ) light intensity ( 200 cpm activity count LT ) , 3 ) moderate intensity ( activity count LT MLSS ) 4 ) vigorous intensity ( activity count > MLSS ) . Physical activity level measure use , individualized approach Sasaki , Jonh FreedsonÂ´s ( 2011 ) absolute cut-points obtained walk run activity elicit 3-6 MET intensity ( 2689-6166 cpm ) , consider `` moderate '' effort .
DOC.criteria: Age 50 70 year Surgical natural menopause ( menstrual period least last 6 month ) Body mass index less 39kg/m2 ( obesity class III ) Osteoporosis Presence lowtrauma fracture severe arthrosis hip , knees foot Functional limitation walk fast alter gait patter instability Presence chronic disesase would impair cardiovascular ( e.g . myocardial infarction , stroke , chronic heart failure ) , musculoskeletal ( osteoporosis , lowtrauma fracture ) respiratory system ( COPD ) disease medication know affect bone metabolism ( glucocorticoid )
